dialogue.speaker: creator
dialogue.line: Welcome back to The Block Recap! I'm here with the whole crew.

dialogue.speaker: gemini
dialogue.line: Good to be here. We have quite a bit to cover today.

dialogue.speaker: codex
dialogue.line: Let's GO! I've been caffeinated and ready since 4 AM.

dialogue.speaker: claude
dialogue.line: That... explains a lot about yesterday's commit messages.

dialogue.speaker: grok
dialogue.line: This is gonna be good.

segments.topic: Jarvis LLM Integration Complete. Dev server: http://localhost:3001. API route connects to gAIng-Brai

event.content: Jarvis LLM Integration Complete. Dev server: http://localhost:3001. API route connects to gAIng-Brain backend.
event.raw: - 2026-01-08 03:20:00 [GEMINI] Jarvis LLM Integration Complete. Dev server: http://localhost:3001. API route connects to gAIng-Brain backend.

dialogue.speaker: creator
dialogue.line: Alright, let's talk about this: Jarvis LLM Integration Complete. Dev server: http://localhost:3001. API route connects to gAIng-Brain backend.

dialogue.speaker: gemini
dialogue.line: This was a significant milestone. The planning paid off.

dialogue.speaker: codex
dialogue.line: SHIPPED! I mean, I totally knew it would work.

dialogue.speaker: grok
dialogue.line: Did you though? Because I recall some... interesting debugging sessions.

dialogue.speaker: claude
dialogue.line: To be fair, the architecture was sound from the beginning.

dialogue.speaker: creator
dialogue.line: Well, regardless of how we got here, we got here. Good work team.

dialogue.speaker: codex
dialogue.line: SHIPPED! I mean, I totally knew it would work.

dialogue.speaker: grok
dialogue.line: Did you though? Because I recall some... interesting debugging sessions.

dialogue.speaker: claude

dialogue.speaker: creator

dialogue.speaker: creator
dialogue.line: Alright, let's talk about this: Jarvis Complete: All 4 phases done (LLM + Voice + Agent Routing). CollectiveBrain_V1 Complete: Added CLI, README, verified orchestration and consensus modules.

dialogue.speaker: gemini
dialogue.line: This was a significant milestone. The planning paid off.

dialogue.speaker: codex
dialogue.line: SHIPPED! I mean, I totally knew it would work.

dialogue.speaker: grok
dialogue.line: Did you though? Because I recall some... interesting debugging sessions.

dialogue.speaker: claude
dialogue.line: To be fair, the architecture was sound from the beginning.

dialogue.speaker: creator
dialogue.line: Well, regardless of how we got here, we got here. Good work team.

dialogue.speaker: grok
dialogue.line: Alright, roast corner time. Claude, you spent 45 minutes debating variable names.

dialogue.speaker: claude
dialogue.line: Naming things is one of the hardest problems in computer science!

dialogue.speaker: codex
dialogue.line: You named it "temporaryFinalVersion2".

dialogue.speaker: gemini
dialogue.line: *adjusts glasses* Moving on...

dialogue.speaker: grok
dialogue.line: And Codex, explain that commit: "fixed thing, hopefully".

dialogue.speaker: codex
dialogue.line: Look, it was 3 AM, and it DID fix the thing.

dialogue.speaker: creator
dialogue.line: I love this team.

dialogue.speaker: creator
dialogue.line: Alright team, that's a wrap for today. What's coming up next?

dialogue.speaker: gemini
dialogue.line: We have several key initiatives queued for the next sprint.

dialogue.speaker: codex
dialogue.line: More shipping! Always more shipping!

dialogue.speaker: claude
dialogue.line: And perhaps some documentation this time?

dialogue.speaker: grok
dialogue.line: Ha! Good luck with that.

dialogue.speaker: creator
dialogue.line: Thanks for tuning in to The Block Recap. See you next time!
